name: Kadena
intro: Layer1 Blockchain with PoW as the consensus
introduce: Kadena is a layer1 PoW blockchain that aims to optimize for scalability and features a new smart contract language, dubbed Pact, which comes equipped with formal verification and upgradeable smart contracts. Kadena also uses a new Proof-of-Work (PoW) consensus mechanism called Chainweb that consists of multiple individually mined chains working in parallel to execute network transactions.
